fields.name: waiveServiceFee
fields.description: whether the delegate is qualified for waiving the service fee

methods.name: Hermes
methods.description: Hermes gives delegates who register the service of automatic reward distribution an overview of the reward distributions to their voters within a range of epochs

fields.name: totalCirculatingSupplyNoRewardPool
fields.description: total circulating supply no reward pool

fields.name: blockWindow
fields.description: number of last blocks that are backtracked to compute TPS

fields.name: exist
fields.description: whether the starting epoch number is less than the most recent epoch number

methods.name: MostRecentTPS
methods.description: MostRecentTPS gives the latest transactions per second

methods.name: NumberOfActions
methods.description: NumberOfActions gives the number of actions

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: percentage of the reward to be paid to the delegate

fields.name: exist
fields.description: whether the delegate has bookkeeping information within the specified epoch range

fields.name: count
fields.description: total number of buckets in the given epoch for the given delegate

fields.name: exist
fields.description: whether the delegate has voting bucket information within the specified epoch range

fields.name: count
fields.description: total number of buckets in the given epoch for the given delegate

fields.name: blockRewardRatio
fields.description: ratio of block reward being distributed

fields.name: epochRewardRatio
fields.description: ratio of epoch reward being distributed

fields.name: foundationBonusRatio
fields.description: ratio of foundation bonus being distributed

fields.name: exist
fields.description: whether the delegate has hermes information within the specified epoch range

fields.name: exist
fields.description: whether the delegate has productivity information within the specified epoch range

fields.name: exist
fields.description: whether the delegate has reward information within the specified epoch range

methods.name: BucketInfo
methods.description: BucketInfo provides voting bucket detail information for candidates within a range of epochs

methods.name: BookKeeping
methods.description: BookKeeping gives delegates an overview of the reward distributions to their voters within a range of epochs

methods.name: Productivity
methods.description: Productivity gives block productivity of producers within a range of epochs

methods.name: Reward
methods.description: Rewards provides reward detail information for candidates within a range of epochs

methods.name: HermesByDelegate
methods.description: HermesByDelegate returns Hermes delegates' distribution history

scalarValueTypes.notes: Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers – if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint32 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers – if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint64 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int32s.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int64s.
Always four bytes. More efficient than uint32 if values are often greater than 2^28.
Always eight bytes. More efficient than uint64 if values are often greater than 2^56.
A string must always contain UTF-8 encoded or 7-bit ASCII text.
May contain any arbitrary sequence of bytes.
